item.title: Aspose.Drawing for .NET 24.1 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Drawing for .NET 24.1. Major Features Several improvements and features were added this month. The most notable are: Improved correctness of vector regions and enabled them by default (DRAWINGNET-1452) Implemented support for subpixel rectangles in clipping and regions (DRAWINGNET-963 and DRAWINGNET-1196) Fixed Region.GetBounds() for large regions (DRAWINGNET-1203) Added Aspose.Drawing.Common DLLs for direct download (DRAWINGNET-1461) Got a Query? Have any questions or queries about the API?
